title: Progress and Future Prospect of Silicon Photonics Based Large Scale Optical Switches
abstract: Silicon photonics switches offer fast switching, compactness, low power consumption, and low-cost, which makes it essential for energy-efficient optical circuit switching networks. In this presentation, we review its recent technology progress and future prospect.
